text:
Streamed live on Jul 21, 2018

The Virginia Bar Association hosts the first U.S. Senate debate Virginia's 2018 election. Sen. Tim Kaine (D) will face Corey Stewart (R) on July 21.



Find more from PBS NewsHour at https://www.pbs.org/newshour
